argument.name: number_of_spaces
argument.description: The number of space characters to place into the output string. Numeric

page.description: Returns a character string containing a specified number of spaces.
page.discussion: Returns a character string containing the specified Number_Of_Spaces. SPACE() creates a string with an arbitrary number of spaces. You typically use SPACE() when constructing character strings by concatenating pieces together, because it enables you to insert blank spaces between the pieces.
